item.title: What I've Been Learning in Python
What I've Been Learning in Python
item.description: Though the majority of SDS 348 was focused on getting more comfortable with R, I learned some Python at the end. Though I had already learned some Python in previous coding classes, I had never learned about regex (regular expressions) before. This method of finding parts in strings was really interesting to me! Hereâ€™s an example of what we did in our homeworks: Using re.findall(), match all numbers and pull them from the following string (string1).
